message.content: Most men in Gabon have a negative perception of divorce. They generally view it as a failure and a disruption to the traditional family structure. Men in Gabon often prioritize maintaining a stable and harmonious family life, and divorce is seen as a threat to this ideal. They may perceive divorce as a reflection of personal and societal shortcomings, and it can carry a social stigma. Consequently, many men in Gabon strive to avoid divorce and work towards resolving marital issues to preserve their family unit.
